00035 #ifndef SeExpression_h
00036 #define SeExpression_h
00037 
00038 #include <string>
00039 #include <map>
00040 #include <set>
00041 #include <vector>
00042 #include "SeVec3d.h"
00043 
00044 class SeExprNode;
00045 class SeExprVarNode;
00046 class SeExprLocalVarRef;
00047 class SeExprFunc;
00048 class SeExpression;
00049 
00051 class SeExprVarRef
00052 {
00053  public:
00054     virtual ~SeExprVarRef() {}
00055 
00057     virtual bool isVec() = 0;
00058 
00061     virtual void eval(const SeExprVarNode* node, SeVec3d& result) = 0;
00062 };
00063 
00065 class SeExprVectorVarRef : public SeExprVarRef
00066 {
00067  public:
00068     virtual bool isVec() { return 1; }
00069 };
00070 
00071 
00073 class SeExprScalarVarRef : public SeExprVarRef
00074 {
00075  public:
00076     virtual bool isVec() { return 0; }
00077 };
00078 
00080 class SeExprLocalVarRef : public SeExprVarRef
00081 {
00082  public:
00083     SeVec3d val;
00084     SeExprLocalVarRef() : _isVec(false) {}
00085     void setIsVec() { _isVec = true; }
00086     virtual void eval(const SeExprVarNode*, SeVec3d& result) 
00087     { result = val; }
00088     virtual bool isVec() { return _isVec; }
00089  private:
00090     bool _isVec;
00091 };
00092 
00093 
00095 class SeExpression
00096 {
00097  public:
00098     typedef std::map<std::string, SeExprLocalVarRef> LocalVarTable;
00099 
00101     struct Error
00102     {
00104         std::string error;
00105 
00107         int startPos;
00108 
00110         int endPos;
00111 
00112         Error(const std::string& errorIn,const int startPosIn,const int endPosIn)
00113             :error(errorIn),startPos(startPosIn),endPos(endPosIn)
00114         {}
00115     };
00116 
00117     SeExpression( );
00118     SeExpression( const std::string &e, bool wantVec=1 );
00119     virtual ~SeExpression();
00120 
00124     void setWantVec(bool wantVec);
00125 
00128     void setExpr(const std::string& e);
00129 
00131     const std::string& getExpr() const { return _expression; }
00132 
00136     bool syntaxOK() const;
00137 
00142     bool isValid() const;
00143 
00146     const std::string& parseError() const { return _parseError; }
00147 
00150     const std::vector<Error>& getErrors() const
00151     {return _errors;}
00152 
00155     bool isConstant() const;
00156 
00159     bool usesVar(const std::string& name) const;
00160 
00163     bool usesFunc(const std::string& name) const;
00164 
00166     bool isThreadSafe() const
00167     {return _threadUnsafeFunctionCalls.size()==0;}
00168 
00171     void setThreadUnsafe(const std::string& functionName) const
00172     {_threadUnsafeFunctionCalls.push_back(functionName);}
00173 
00175     const std::vector<std::string>& getThreadUnsafeFunctionCalls() const
00176     {return _threadUnsafeFunctionCalls;}
00177     
00179     bool wantVec() const { return _wantVec; }
00180 
00184     bool isVec() const;
00185 
00187     SeVec3d evaluate() const;
00188 
00190     void reset();
00191 
00193     virtual SeExprVarRef* resolveVar(const std::string& name) const {return 0;}
00194 
00196     virtual SeExprFunc* resolveFunc(const std::string& name) const {return 0;}
00197 
00199     void addError(const std::string& error,const int startPos,const int endPos) const
00200     {_errors.push_back(Error(error,startPos,endPos));}
00201 
00203     const LocalVarTable& getLocalVars() const {return _localVars;}
00204 
00205  private:
00207     SeExpression( const SeExpression &e );
00208     SeExpression &operator=( const SeExpression &e );
00209 
00211     void parse() const;
00212 
00215     void prep() const;
00216 
00218     void parseIfNeeded() const { if (!_parsed) parse(); }
00219 
00221     void prepIfNeeded() const { if (!_prepped) prep(); }
00222 
00224     bool _wantVec;
00225 
00227     std::string _expression;
00228     
00230     mutable SeExprNode *_parseTree;
00231 
00233     mutable bool _parsed, _prepped;
00234     
00236     mutable std::string _parseError;
00237 
00239     mutable std::vector<Error> _errors;
00240 
00242     mutable std::set<std::string> _vars;
00243 
00245     mutable std::set<std::string> _funcs;
00246 
00248     mutable LocalVarTable _localVars;
00249 
00251     mutable std::vector<std::string> _threadUnsafeFunctionCalls;
00252 
00253     /* internal */ public:
00254 
00256     void addVar(const char* n) const { _vars.insert(n); }
00257 
00259     void addFunc(const char* n) const { _funcs.insert(n); }
00260 
00262     SeExprVarRef* resolveLocalVar(const char* n) const {
00263         LocalVarTable::iterator iter = _localVars.find(n);
00264         if (iter != _localVars.end()) return &iter->second;
00265         return 0;
00266     }
00267 
00270     SeExprLocalVarRef* getLocalVar(const char* n) const {
00271         return &_localVars[n]; 
00272     }
00273 };
